title: Slaughtering Animal Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Slaughtering Animal Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Slaughtering Animal Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 246
items.arabic: ((بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ [اللَّهُمَّ مِنْكَ وَلَكَ] اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّي)).
